titleStmt.title: A discourse betwixt Alexander the Great, and Dindimus King of the Brachmans, which has been printed in Greek and Latine, and also into High Dutch, in anno 1642. / And made into English by T Raicroft in London, 1668.
titleStmt.author: Raicroft, T., fl. 1688.

notesStmt.note: From fragment B of the medieval alliterative romance of Alisaunder, which was allegedly translated from Latin ca. 1340 A.D.--cf. Cambridge Bibliography of English Literature.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
